member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: The class provides string extension methods.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: The method hashes a string with the MD5 algorithm
member.param: The string to be hashed

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: The method checks if the string has a boolean value
member.param: The string to be converted to boolean
member.returns: Returns true if the string has a boolean true value, false - otherwise

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: The method tries to parse the string to short
member.param: The string to be converted to short
member.returns: Returns variable of type short if the string is a number, null - otherwise

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: The method tries to parse the string to integer
member.param: The string to be converted to int
member.returns: Returns variable of type int if the string is a number, null - otherwise

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: The method tries to parse the string to long
member.param: The string to be converted to long
member.returns: Returns variable of type long if the string is a number, null - otherwise

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: The method tries to parse the string to DateTime format
member.param: The string to be converted to DateTime variable
member.returns: Returns variable of type DateTime if the string can be parsed, null - otherwise

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: The method capitalizes the first letter of the string
member.param: The string to be capitalized

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method returns a substring between two strings
member.param: The string from which the method returns a substring
Starting point of the substring
Ending point of the substring
from wgere to start searching for startString (optional)
member.returns: Returns the string between startString and endString. If the arguments are not contained in the initial string, the method returns an empty string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: The method converts a cyrillic text to latin one
member.param: The string to be converted to latin
member.returns: Returns the converted to latin cyrillic text

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: The method converts a latin text to cyrillic one
member.param: The string to be converted to cyrillic
member.returns: Returns the converted to cyrillic latin text

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: The method replaces all invalid symbols with empty string
member.param: The string to be validated
member.returns: Returns the string converted to a valid username

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: The method replaces all invalid symbols with empty string
member.param: The string to be converted to valid file name
member.returns: Returns the string converted to a valid file name

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: The method returns the first N characters of the string
member.param: The string from which the method returns a substring
How many characters to take from the string

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: The method gets the extension of a string with filename
member.param: file string
member.returns: Returns the file extension or empty string if the fileName string IsNullOrWhiteSpace or has no extension

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: The method gets the content type of a file extension
member.param: file extension string
member.returns: Returns the content type if known, "application/octet-stream" - otherwise

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: The method converts a string to byte array
member.param: The string to be converted to byte array
member.returns: Returns a byte array of the string
